extendedInfo.description: Do you ever get stumped while playing Hanging With Friends? Not anymore! You just found the easiest and fastest way to get help while playing your favorite hangman game! Our exclusive transparent overlay appears right on top of your game whenever you need help building or solving words to ensure you always have a big leg-up on your friends. The build mode overlay sits right on top of your rack so that you can easily enter all of your letters and your special board space. Just click "Build" and get the highest scoring words and gain coins faster than ever! Stump all your friends with hard-to-solve words every time!Solve mode is designed to sit directly above the word you're trying to solve. Simply click on the letters you know aren't in the word to X them out. Enter the letters you know are in the word using the intuitive popup keyboard feature. Clicking solve will deliver all of the most probable letters and best guesses to make.-The most intuitive UI of any Hanging With Friends helper-Amazingly fast searches-Click on any word to get its definition and never be accused of cheating by using words you don't know!-Easily switch between apps using notificationsAs with all epEK.ware apps, comments and feedback on Hanging With Help For Friends are always appreciated. A link to my email address can be found within the app.Note: This app is in no way associated with Zynga, Inc, makers of the Hanging With Friends word game. This cheat app is made by an independent developer.

reviews.title: What happened?!
reviews.comment: Used to be awesome app but doesn\'t work for sh*t anymore. Every move the screen turns black and kicks me back to Hanging home page. FIX NOW!! Also needs to fix vowel situation. Worthless.
reviews.author: Brittany Haak

reviews.title: Would be nice!
reviews.comment: Minus 1 star cuz it does not have the same rule with \"hanging with friends\", given last vowel for hint. When solving it shows words with more vowels following....would be nice if u can fix it!
reviews.author: denise maasen

reviews.title: Brilliant!
reviews.comment: This developer knows how to create great cheating tool for all the \"With Friends\" games! His apps are well designed and are made as simple as possible. Ogre word finders can be a bit unintuitive, but this one rocks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: Very fast and easy to use.  And a great developer to boot!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: This app is great and really easy to use. It gives you a bit of help when your really stuck. HTC Desire Z
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Woohoo! Latest update fixed the bottom row of numbers being blocked. Now I can cheat with no problems!
reviews.author: JCandMandy Ballard

reviews.title: HTC EVO 3D
reviews.comment: Excellent app deep up the good updates!
reviews.author: A Google User
